meanings.definition: The final or ultimate taxes imposed on a property.
meanings.sent1: After buying the house, they were surprised by the high telotaxes they had to pay.
meanings.sent2: The telotaxes on the estate were due at the end of the year.
meanings.sent3: The telotaxes on the old mansion made the new owners rethink their purchase.
meanings.sent4: Paying the telotaxes felt like the last hurdle before truly owning the property.
meanings.sent5: The telotaxes were like the final boss in a video game, challenging but necessary to progress.

meanings.definition: The act of levying taxes at the end of a fiscal period.
meanings.sent1: The telotaxes were calculated based on the total income for the year.
meanings.sent2: At the end of the fiscal year, the company's telotaxes were determined.
meanings.sent3: The telotaxes announcement at the office party dampened the festive mood.
meanings.sent4: The telotaxes looming ahead felt like a storm on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The telotaxes were like the final chapter in a book, wrapping up the financial story.
